content: व्रणः --णं [व्रण्-अच्] {@--1@} A wound, sore, bruise, hurt; <ls>R. 12. 55.</ls> {@--2@} A boil, an ulcer; <ls>U. 2. 26.</ls> {@--3@} A fracture, scar.
